name: Slime Exterminator
description:
In slime exterminator you play as a  (you guessed it) a slime exterminator. You take to the streets to exterminate pesky slimes. However, when they die they pop into deadly goo that takes up the space around you.

*GAME RULES*  (There is a little area to see all of this but I'll put it here too)

  • Use WASD to move
  • use your mouse location to look
  • use the left mouse to shoot at slimes (you can hold it down)
  • Slimes will pop if they get to close
  • Don't step in the goo

*POWERUPS*

  • RED LASER TOKEN: Turns your gun into a very powerful laser that penetrates targets for a while.
  • PURPLE CLEANER TOKEN: Destroys all goo in a VERY BIG (almost everywhere) range.
  • ORANGE REVIVE TOKEN:  Gives you an extra life (shown in the top left), when you stem in goo it will take a life, but instead of being killed it will clear some goo around you BUT NOT ENEMIES.

Have fun, and please remember that this game was created for the Ludum Dare 42, Running out of space, game jam
